channel.title: [317] Getting Rid of the Title Screen Fire [317]
channel.description: This question in general makes me feel like a total idiot... Can someone tell me how to get rid of that annoying fire on the title screen? It's annoying when I change the title background and that fire doesn't go with it at all. Thanks for the help. :) I believe its a non-renamed client, if that makes a difference. But just in case, can someone let me know how you can check? :P

item.title: [317] Getting Rid of the Title Screen Fire [317]
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

Thanks for the help.
After looking through the Sprites, I couldn’t find anything that resembled fire.
And then, after looking through half of my client.java, I decided to just search ‘Flame’

public boolean flameson = true;

To…

public boolean flameson = false;

I felt dumb.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Getting Rid of the Title Screen Fire [317]

item.title: [317] Getting Rid of the Title Screen Fire [317]
item.dc:creator: @Chosen_Pkz Chosen Pkz
item.description:
@Chosen_Pkz wrote:

Its really tricky, everyone has had a problem with it once. It should be in your sprites somewhere.

If not, you got to hunt it down in your client.java.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Getting Rid of the Title Screen Fire [317]
